p.p: The name used by T24 to recognise the tag defined in TAG field.
Fields TAG to MAPPING form a related multi value set.

desc.p: A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.

p.p: The actual name of the tag in the XML document. The naming of the tag is arbitrary, but should match the name set up in the XML document.
Fields TAG to MAPPING form a related multi value set.

desc.p: A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
